original_text: It will be very bad for you, teachers of God's Law and Pharisees. You are hypocrites! When you grow spices to cook with food, you give a tenth part of these small things to God. You are right to obey this rule. But you do not obey the more important parts of God's Law. You do not help people in a good way. You are not kind to them. You do not always do what God says is right. You should have done these important things as well as the other small things.
korean_text: 화 있을진저 외식하는 서기관들과 바리새인들이여 너희가 박하와 회향과 근채의 십일조는 드리되 율법의 더 중한 바 정의와 긍휼과 믿음은 버렸도다 그러나 이것도 행하고 저것도 버리지 말아야 할지니라

sentences.original_text: It will be very bad for you
teachers of God's Law and Pharisees
When you grow spices to cook with food
sentences.korean_translation: 너희가 음식을 조리하기 위해 향신료를 재배할 때

sentences.original_text: you give a tenth part of these small things to God
sentences.korean_translation: 너희는 이 작은 것들의 십일조를 하나님께 바친다

sentences.original_text: You are right to obey this rule
sentences.korean_translation: 너희가 이 규칙을 지키는 것은 옳다

sentences.original_text: But you do not obey the more important parts of God's Law
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 너희는 하나님의 율법의 더 중요한 부분을 지키지 않는다

sentences.original_text: You do not help people in a good way
sentences.korean_translation: 너희는 좋은 방식으로 사람들을 돕지 않는다

sentences.original_text: You are not kind to them
You do not always do what God says is right
sentences.korean_translation: 너희는 항상 하나님이 옳다고 하신 것을 행하지 않는다

sentences.original_text: You should have done these important things
sentences.korean_translation: 너희는 이 중요한 것들을 행해야 했다

sentences.original_text: as well as the other small things
